doc:
Michael Garner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Garner 0 Michael Gordon Garner (born 3 October 1954 in Edmonton, London) is an English theatre and television actor who is best known for playing Leading Firefighter/Sub Officer Geoffrey "Poison" Pearce in London's Burning between 1993 and 2002. Michael_Gordon_Garner ( born 3_October_1954 in Edmonton , London ) is an_English_theatre_and_television_actor who is_best_known for playing Leading Firefighter/Sub_Officer_Geoffrey_"_Poison_"_Pearce in London 's_Burning between 1993_and_2002 .
